# placelabel

The goal of placelabel is to plot place labels but it's ultimately doomed. 

This would be better as a `text` method for sf objects but sf plots rarely leave the graphics frame in a state that can be added to. Hence doom. 

Use `ggplot2::geom_sf` in the dev version.
